name: Game Cuber
description:
An extremely goofy game where you play as the purple Game Cube introduction logo cube.

You move the cube and make purple square paths while playing joyful sounds. You reset and make some more paths. You quit, and go outside and look at birds.

Arrows: Move
Space: Jump
R: Reset Stage
Escape: Quit Game

Source files (for Unity v2018.1.6f1, but probably any v5.5+ version will work) are available for download as well.
